data.name: KotLand
data.description: KotLand is the biggest Kotlin conference in the Eastern Europe. Speakers from all over the world will share their experience about Kotlin on Android, Server, Web, Multiplatform and Native.

relatedRecords.name: DevTalks Cluj-Napoca 2020
relatedRecords.description: DevTalks Cluj-Napoca is happening once a year and it brings a full day, in the middle of May, of content and connects every business everywhere through the IT Community thus connecting the developers across the world to share their experience with one another.
